attributes.action: Introduce Traffic Calming Measures Along Lower Green Road, Pembury
attributes.background:
Every day a seemingly increasing number of drivers travel down Lower Green at dangerous speeds, with no regard for the well being / safety of those that live along and use it.
With two Nurseries, a School and a zebra crossing along this road, I dread to think what speeds are reached further down.

rejection.details: This petition has been rejected because it is about something that is the responsibility of your local council, not the UK Government or Parliament. You may wish to get in touch with your local council and raise this with them directly.
